AES Module¶

aes_utils.py

Provides AES encryption and decryption utilities for the secure UDP chat application. Uses AES in CBC mode with PKCS7 padding and random IV for each encryption.

Author: Burak Yilmaz

secure_crypto.aes_utils.aes_decrypt(aes_key, b64_ciphertext)¶

Decrypts a base64-encoded AES ciphertext string.

Parameters:

  • aes_key (bytes) – 16-byte AES key used for encryption.

  • b64_ciphertext (str) – Base64-encoded ciphertext containing IV + encrypted data.

Returns:

The original decrypted plaintext message.

Return type:

str

secure_crypto.aes_utils.aes_encrypt(aes_key, plaintext)¶

Encrypts a plaintext message using AES encryption in CBC mode.

Parameters:

  • aes_key (bytes) – 16-byte AES key.

  • plaintext (str) – The plaintext message to encrypt.

Returns:

Base64-encoded string containing IV + encrypted ciphertext.

Return type:

str

Udp_secure_chat
